doc.name: SDFTransformer
doc.description: This is an abstract base class for actors that transform an input stream into an output stream. It provides an input and an output port.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee, Steve Neuendorffer
doc.port: The input port. This base class imposes no type constraints except that the type of the input cannot be greater than the type of the output.
The output port. By default, the type of this output is constrained to be at least that of the input.
doc.property: The rate parameter for the input port.
The rate parameter for the output port.
The rate parameter for the output port that declares the initial production.
